description: Create a Superior Bowen Apex Viewpoint ticket export.
permissions: Allowed for admins, or users who are managers of a related material supplier or the related broker.
side_effects: Generates a CSV export by querying Apex/JWS during creation; errors can surface if Apex/JWS is unavailable.
validation_notes: --sale-date-min and --sale-date-max are required and must parse as dates in YYYY-MM-DD format. sale-date-max must be greater than or equal to sale-date-min. If provided, location-ids must be valid Apex location IDs.

flags.name: --sale-date-min
flags.validation: Required. Must be a date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

flags.name: --sale-date-max
flags.validation: Required. Must be a date in YYYY-MM-DD format and on or after sale-date-min.

flags.name: --location-ids
flags.description: Location IDs to include (comma-separated or repeated)
flags.validation: Optional. Comma-separated or repeated values are accepted (e.g., 001,004). Must be valid Apex location IDs.
